---
title: "Collaborative Notes"
---

```{r}
#| echo: false
#| message: false
#| warning: false

library(readxl); library(pander)

str_prep <- function(var){
  as.list(
    stringr::str_split(var, "\r\n", simplify=TRUE)
    )
}

topic_mats <- read_excel("schedule_615.xlsx", sheet="weekly_schedule") |>
  dplyr::select(collab) |> na.omit()
```


```{r}
pander(str_prep(topic_mats$collab))
```
